name.description: The name of the service instance
name.title: Service name

user.description: The user that the service will run as.
user.title: User

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.
service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

mesos_api_version.description: Configures the Mesos API version to use. Possible values: V0 (non-HTTP), V1 (HTTP)

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

sleep.description: The sleep duration in seconds before tasks exit.

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of SQL pods to run

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: minio pod persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

config_disk.title: Disk size (MB)
config_disk.description: Template pod persistent disk requirements (in MB)

config_disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
config_disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

SQL_storage_class_standard.title: SQL storage class standard
SQL_storage_class_standard.description: Value for SQL storage standard class

SQL_storage_class_rrs.title: SQL storage class rrs
SQL_storage_class_rrs.description: Value for SQL reduced redundancy standard class

SQL_cache_exclude.title: SQL cache exclude
SQL_cache_exclude.description: list of wildcard patterns for prefixes to exclude from cache

name.title: Service name

user.title: User

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)

mesos_api_version.description: Configures the Mesos API version to use. Possible values: V0 (non-HTTP), V1 (HTTP)

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

sleep.description: The sleep duration in seconds before tasks exit.

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of myservice pods to run

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: myservice pod persistent disk requirements (in MB)
